resourceTemplates.name: search-email
resourceTemplates.title: Search email
resourceTemplates.description: Search emails using a name, email address, or keyword with optional filters for status, importance, flagged, or attachments. Use 'searchQuery' for keyword and 'filterQuery' for advanced filtering.

resourceTemplates.name: emails-from-folder
resourceTemplates.title: Emails from folder
resourceTemplates.description: Get the 10 most recent emails from a specified mail folder (e.g. Inbox, Sent, Archive), optionally filtered by any property such as attachments or status.

resourceTemplates.name: attachments-of-email
resourceTemplates.title: Attachments of an email
resourceTemplates.description: Get metadata for up to 10 attachments of a specified email by message ID, including name, size, and type.

resourceTemplates.name: search-contacts
resourceTemplates.title: Search contacts
resourceTemplates.description: Search personal contacts by name, company, or other field, returning up to 10 results.

resourceTemplates.name: single-email-details
resourceTemplates.title: Single email details
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve the full details and body content of a specific email by message ID, including recipients, attachments, and the complete message body.
